Introduction

Park Jeong Woo is a South Korean singer under YG Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group TREASURE.

In 2018, Park Jeong Woo participated in YG Entertainment's new survival show, YG Treasure Box. On January 21, 2019, he was announced as the fifth member of the boy group TREASURE.

Jeongwoo debuted as a member of TREASURE on August 7, 2020 with the single album, The First Step: Chapter One.
